section_text: 1 1 Section 2 of the Northern Ireland Arms Decommissioning Act 1997 (c. 7) (duration of decommissioning scheme) is amended as follows. 2 In subsection (2)(a), for “the first anniversary of the day on which this Act is passed” substitute  “                27th February 2003              ” . 3 In subsection (3)(b), for “more than five years after the day on which this Act is passed” substitute  “                later than 27th February 2007              ” . 4 If this section comes into force after 26th February 2002, a scheme which would at any time have been a decommissioning scheme for the purposes of the Northern Ireland Arms Decommissioning Act 1997 had this section come into force on that date, is to be treated as having been such a scheme at that time.
2 This Act may be cited as the Northern Ireland Arms Decommissioning (Amendment) Act 2002.
